title: Exquisite Diamond Leaf Pendant - A Modern Vaddanam Touch
materials: 18K Rose Gold with meticulously pave-set VVS Clarity Diamonds. The gold showcases a subtle Hyderabadi polish
features: Features a graceful, repeating leaf design. The delicate openwork structure allows light to maximize the sparkle of the diamonds. Modern interpretation of the traditional Vaddanam (waist belt) motif, suitable as a pendant centerpiece or saree pin (kuchu).
colors: Rose gold and brilliant white diamonds
creating a warm and radiant color scheme.
occasions: or to add a touch of modern glamour to traditional attire. Suitable for weddings
description: This pendant is a testament to contemporary design meets timeless elegance. The intricate diamond setting and the warm rose gold hue exude sophistication. The VVS diamonds offer exceptional brilliance, ensuring a striking presence. An excellent investment piece that transcends trends.
